Package dataaccesslayer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GradeDao
    An interface for accessing and manipulating Grade data in the database.
    StudentDao
    An interface defining the operations that can be performed on the student data in the data access layer.
    TutorCourseDao
    This interface provides the methods for accessing and manipulating tutor-course relationship data in a data source.
    TutorsDao
    This interface represents the data access object for Tutors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataSource
    The DataSource class provides a connection to a MySQL database for a Java application.
    GradeDaoImpl
    Implements the GradeDao interface and provides access to the grade data source.
    StudentDaoImpl
    The StudentDaoImpl class implements the StudentDao interface and provides access to the StudentDTO objects stored in the database.
    TutorCourseDaoImpl
    The TutorCourseDaoImpl class implements the TutorCourseDao interface, providing methods for accessing and manipulating tutor-course relationship data in a data source.
    TutorsDaoImpl
    TutorsDaoImpl implements TutorsDao interface and provides implementation for accessing Tutors table in database.
